headline: Steel Dynamics (STLD) Valuation Check After Recent Mixed Short Term Share Performance
summary: Steel Dynamics (STLD) is back on radar after recent trading left the shares with mixed short term returns, including a small one day decline and modest gains over the past week. See our latest analysis for Steel Dynamics. That small 1 day share price decline sits within a steadier pattern, with a 7 day share price return of 2.5% and a 90 day share price return of 12.85%. Meanwhile, the 1 year total shareholder return of 39.95% and 5 year total shareholder return of 388.98% point to momentum...
